metadata.title: Construct lentiviral plasmid library with pooled sgRNAs

params.note: Individually cloned sgRNA pairs and pooled them equally to construct a lentiviral plasmid library (Extended Data Fig. 3a,b).
Used a low infection rate of 2.5% to ensure lentiviral integration frequency was limited to one per cell (ref. 18) (Extended Data Fig. 3câ€“e).
